Procedure.name: setupKKG
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=KKG receiversSetup=KKG receiversMode=SINGLEDISH initialize=KKG device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupLLP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=LP receiversSetup=LLP receiversMode=C1C1 initialize=LLP device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupPPP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=LP receiversSetup=PPP receiversMode=C1C1 initialize=PPP device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupPLP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=LP receiversSetup=LPP receiversMode=C1C1 initialize=PLP device=0 calOff
